A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was GREAT. As someone who grew up with the Original Trilogy\, and have loved star wars since I could talk this movie hit on so many different levels. The force is back to being an energy field created by all living things that surrounds us\, penetrates us\, and binds the galaxy together. Not what your expecting but everything you want. My inner child was so giddy throughout this whole movie! Go see it!!
